detailsData.title: Complex Agreement Negotiation
detailsData.content: Jay has extensive experience negotiating complex commercial agreements with top technology companies. This ensures that clients receive the best possible terms and protections.

detailsData.title: Tailored Legal Strategy
detailsData.content: Jay provides tailored advice and strategy for agreements ranging from five to nine figures. This personalized approach ensures that each client's unique needs are met.

detailsData.title: Efficient Legal Services
detailsData.content: Jay makes legal services more efficient by creating form libraries and negotiation playbooks. This reduces time and costs for clients.

detailsData.title: Comprehensive Product Counseling
detailsData.content: Jay offers product counseling through all aspects of developing, operating, and monetizing websites and mobile applications. This comprehensive service helps clients navigate complex legal landscapes.

subHeading: Bringing a problem-solving and intellectually curious engineering mentality to legal services.
valueProp: Bringing a problem-solving and intellectually curious engineering mentality to legal services.

testimonalData.text: Jay's expertise in negotiating complex agreements has been invaluable to our business.

testimonalData.text: The tailored legal strategies provided by Jay have significantly benefited our company.

testimonalData.text: Jay's efficient legal services have saved us both time and money.
